about.intro: I am a full-stack developer with two years of experience, primarily focused on front-end development using React and TypeScript. On the back end, I have worked with Java Spring Boot to design APIs and integrate databases, building stable and scalable services. I also have hands-on experience in cloud and automation, having designed CI/CD pipelines and set up deployment environments using AWS services and Docker.

acs.title: Coupang Digital VI System â€“ Apple Care Service (ACS)
acs.desc:
ACS (Apple Care Service) is a service that allows customers who purchase Apple devices on Coupang to pay for the existing one-time insurance product, Apple Care+, through a monthly subscription plan.
This reduces the initial cost burden and aims to attract more customers.
The service architecture is designed to be expandable beyond Apple Care+, enabling support for other device warranty and insurance products in the future.
features: Digital product subscription management and term-based subscription tracking
Registration and modification of payment methods for subscriptions
Subscription status management via the admin page
Development and operation of API, interface, and batch processes

crewcall.title: LG U+ CrewCall (Group Call)
crewcall.desc: A group calling app pre-installed on LG U+ smartphones, supporting up to 10 simultaneous participants and favorite group management for quick calls. In this project, I contributed to WebView backend development (Spring Boot, Java), implementation of authentication, terms agreement, and settings features, as well as CI/CD and deployment automation.
features: Group calls with up to 10 participants
Favorite group management and quick call initiation
WebView-based experience within the mobile app
User experience optimized for quick group calling
role: Developed and implemented WebView backend (Spring Boot, Java) and UI
Operated CI/CD pipelines and managed deployment processes
Monitored and maintained service operation environments (K8s, Docker)
